text:
If you gave WhatsApp
access to your contacts,
all you need to do is add a new contact
to your phone the way you normally would.
Be sure to add the country code.
Then when you open WhatsApp,
the new contact from your phone
will automatically appear in WhatsApp.
You can also add a new contact to WhatsApp
within the app itself.
To do so, first open WhatsApp.
Then click on the new chat icon
in the upper right-hand corner.
Then select "New Contact."

Then fill out their name,
country, phone number,
and any other relevant information.
Finally, click "Save."
If neither of these options are working,
it means the person you're trying to add
doesn't have a WhatsApp account.

In that case, you can send
them an invite to WhatsApp
by going to "Settings."
Then click on "Tell a Friend."

Then choose the way you
want to invite your friend
through text message, email, or other.

Once they accept your invitation
and download WhatsApp,
then you can add them into your contacts.
